body: Title. +foxes, +redpandas, +aww, etc. are all out of /all now. I picked "outdoors" for +foxes since that's the closest one, but it's not a great match.
body_html: Title. +foxes, +redpandas, +Aww, etc. are all out of /all now. I picked "outdoors" for +foxes since that's the closest one, but it's not a great match.

guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

guild.name: Ruqqus

title: Admins forgot to add a category for animal guilds

body:
Many, or even most, of the guilds listed at +GuildsofSubstance such as animal guilds do not have engaged GMs and have not been categorized and are not likely to be categorized in the near future....and thus I can go post some images to +Elephants or +Horses or +Jaguars or +MeerkatPrairieDogChipmunk but it will never be seen by anybody on Ruqqus.

It's a horrible change they've made.

That said, yeah would "Foxes" go under "Outdoor" or "Nature"? Why is there an "Entertainment News" category? Why roll out a half-assed feature that you admit is "rushed" that serves no purpose? Why not simply prompt GMs of uncategorized guilds to categorize them next time they log in...without affecting the visibility of the guild for other people?
body_html:
Many, or even most, of the guilds listed at +GuildsOfSubstance such as animal guilds do not have engaged GMs and have not been categorized and are not likely to be categorized in the near future....and thus I can go post some images to +elephants or +horses or +Jaguars or +MeerkatPrairieDogChipmunk but it will never be seen by anybody on Ruqqus.

It's a horrible change they've made.

That said, yeah would "Foxes" go under "Outdoor" or "Nature"? Why is there an "Entertainment News" category? Why roll out a half-assed feature that you admit is "rushed" that serves no purpose? Why not simply prompt GMs of uncategorized guilds to categorize them next time they log in...without affecting the visibility of the guild for other people?

parent.body:
Many, or even most, of the guilds listed at +GuildsofSubstance such as animal guilds do not have engaged GMs and have not been categorized and are not likely to be categorized in the near future....and thus I can go post some images to +Elephants or +Horses or +Jaguars or +MeerkatPrairieDogChipmunk but it will never be seen by anybody on Ruqqus.

It's a horrible change they've made.

That said, yeah would "Foxes" go under "Outdoor" or "Nature"? Why is there an "Entertainment News" category? Why roll out a half-assed feature that you admit is "rushed" that serves no purpose? Why not simply prompt GMs of uncategorized guilds to categorize them next time they log in...without affecting the visibility of the guild for other people?
